page.title: 02LIFE IN 1985
page.content: Life today is comparatively easy in this area.It is a fairly wealthy one though,being commuter territory,the prices are high too. Most families have at least one car and some have even two or three.Most homes have at least one colour television set,stereo and hi_fi equipment and a computer. Housewives have many labour saving devices to help them with the chores. There are electric and computer controlled washing machines,tumble dryers,dishwashers,food processors, coffee making machines,cleaners, polishers.Unfortunately the dusting still has to be done by hand. Husbands have many devices to help them decorate and garden more easily. Family life is very pleasant though it can be isolated.Houses stand in their own grounds.Estates are few.
